channel.title: Skills xp display
channel.description: I wanna change my skills xp display, not sure exactly how to do so, i need some help understanding how it works to be changed.. my xp interface is the first one the second pic is the way i want it.

item.title: Skills xp display
item.dc:creator: @tank_nation tank nation
item.description:
@tank_nation wrote:

Welliton_inc:

I’m sure there are tutorials on this. But you will need to add new sprites to the client in order for that to work.

Ok, im using project insanity base so i can’t use any cache editor just to replace something i believe its in a code somewhere in sprites.java how can i find it?
